localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
blogPost.body: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
blogPost.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 我们取消了点赞、馈赠和垃圾信息，终于把对齐的专业人士有意义地聚集在一起。600+技术领袖通过精心策划的介绍和视频办公时间定期会面，加速他们的进步。
localize.tagline: 与联合创始人、导师、顾问、投资人和客户见面。

localize.description: 我們取消了點贊、饋贈和垃圾信息，終於把對齊的專業人士有意義地聚集在一起。600+技術領袖通過精心策劃的介紹和視頻辦公時間定期會面，加速他們的進步。
localize.tagline: 與聯合創始人、導師、顧問、投資人和客戶見面。

previous.title:
I'm still struggling to understand how a $10 billion family office was running their portfolio like an 18 year old YOLO trader using infinite leverage on Robinhood

It's shocking how often the "smart" money can be so dumb

localize.full_text:
我仍在努力理解一个100亿美元的家族办公室是如何像一个18岁的YOLO交易员一样，利用Robinhood的无限杠杆来管理他们的投资组合的。

令人震惊的是，"聪明 "的资金往往会如此蠢蠢欲动

我仍在努力理解一個100億美元的家族辦公室是如何像一個18歲的YOLO交易員一樣，利用Robinhood的無限槓桿來管理他們的投資組合的。

令人震驚的是，"聰明 "的資金往往會如此蠢蠢欲動
